point1: Parth Jain has progressed from a Backend Development Intern at Engaze Remote to a Research Intern at e-Yantra, IIT Bombay, showcasing his adaptability and growing expertise in AI and data analysis.
point2: His most notable technical work is the development of a Systematic Literature Review for automating Thematic Analysis using AI tools, which has been published in Springer as part of COMPUTE 2024.
point3: Parth's technical strengths lie in programming languages such as Python, Kotlin, and JavaScript, as well as frameworks like Node.js, React, and FastAPI, making him a versatile and skilled developer.
point4: With a strong foundation in data science and AI, Parth has a deep understanding of the healthcare industry, having worked on research projects related to COPD-Asthma management and elder care.
point5: As a detail-oriented and results-driven individual, Parth's unique selling point is his ability to deliver high-quality results, as evident from his published research papers and successful projects, making him a valuable asset to any organization.
